JumpCloud | Sr. Software Engineer, Sr. DevOps Engineer, Sr. Security Engineer | Boulder, Colorado (Greater Denver Area)

ONSITE, REMOTE possible for candidates with a good fit

Like solving BIG problems? Want to solve those problems with cool people? Then JumpCloud wants you. We’re looking for you to be the next member of our awesome engineering team. If you enjoy solving challenging technical problems using the latest technologies in a great team, then this is the job for you. But wait, you haven’t used those technologies? No worries: we’re open minded and we believe that good engineering is not technology specific.

About us: JumpCloud is a well funded, venture backed, cloud directory business based in beautiful downtown Boulder, Colorado. We offer cutting edge hardware and tools, full benefits (medical, dental, vision, 401(k), etc.) and a fast-­paced but casual start­up working environment. Local or relocatable applicant preferred. Our office is right on the Pearl St. Mall in Boulder, stumbling distance to dozens of restaurants, not to mention the epic hiking, biking and climbing opportunities in the Flatirons.

Stack: Postgres/Mongo/Redis, NodeJS/Golang, Docker/Saltstack

Contact: jobs@jumpcloud.com
